DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Glucosanol™ Body Weight Reduction
DOC.criteria: BMI 25 kg/m2 34,9 kg/m2 Generally good health• Desire lose weight Accustomed regular daily consumption 3 main meal ( breakfast , lunch , dinner ) Consistent stable body weight last 3 month prior V1 ( less 5 % selfreported change ) • Readiness take IP recommend Readiness avoid use weight loss and/or management product and/or program study Readiness adhere diet recommendation study Readiness keep habitual level physical activity prior study study Readiness ability complete subject diary study questionnaire Negative pregnancy test ( beta HCGtest urine ) V1 woman childbearing potential Women childbearing potential : commitment use contraception method Known allergy hypersensitivity component investigational product Known allergy hypersensitivity member Fabaceae family Known food allergy ( e.g . cow 's milk , egg , wheat , crustacean , nuts etc . ) Significant disorder : untreated unstable thyroid gland disorder untreated unstable hypertension ( > 140/90 mm Hg ) acute chronic gastrointestinal ( GI ) disease malabsorption disorder ( e.g . inflammatory bowel disease , coeliac disease , pancreatitis etc . ) diabetes mellitus coagulation disorder serious organ systemic disease could influence conduct and/or outcome study and/or could affect tolerability subject ( opinion investigator ) Significant surgery within last 6 month prior V1 : GI surgery liposuction History eat disorder like bulimia , anorexia nervosa , bingeeating within last 12 monthsprior V1 Clinically relevant excursion safety laboratoryparameters Any electronic medical implant Regular use anticoagulant Regular medication and/or supplementation and/or treatment within last 3 month prior V1 study : could influence body weight ( e.g . systemic corticosteroid ) could influence gastrointestinal function ( e.g . antibiotic , laxative , opioids , glucocorticoid , anticholinergic , antidiarrheal etc . ) per investigator judgement weight management ( e.g . fat binder , carbohydrate/starch blocker , fat burner , satiety product , acupuncture etc . ) Consumption food supplement natural health product duration study Diet lose and/or manage weight ( except accord study protocol ) Vegetarian , vegan macrobiotic diet Smoking cessation within 6 month prior V1 study ( regular smoking study level prior study allow ) Pregnancy nurse History current abuse drug , alcohol
